entry.content:
- "thoughts"

I have to thank Davide for this article. Without him I would simply have lost this fuzzize(_funny)_ list of disasters.

Private joke: I hope that flycanard(no links available, sorry) doesn't contain such problems, and that it isn't used in certain production environmen ts... (atomic plants, defense systems, and so on).

update: today I've changed links, added a picture and published this new link, which I find very related to this post
